name: navigation-panel
description: Document navigation panel using special symbols.

defaultSide.title: Default side
defaultSide.description: Default panel side to navigation-panel appear. Restart needed.

markLines.title: Mark section lines
markLines.description: Mark section lines by fancy marker. The style of markers can be customized in `style.less`. Restart needed.

markerType.title: Marker type
markerType.description: Select the type of decoration markers. Restart needed.

markerKind.title: Markers at user section level
markerKind.description: The default behaviour of markup is to use the real section level. In some cases, the user may wish to use user sections instead of the actual section level. Restart needed.

maxHeadingDepth.title: Max sections deepth
maxHeadingDepth.description: The level reference to real section level, not user one. Scope dependend. Refocus needed.

searchBar.title: Show search bar in panel
searchBar.description: Toggla state of search bar in panel view. Restart needed.

categoryBar.title: Show category bar in panel
categoryBar.description: Toggla state of category bar in panel view. Restart needed.

textWrap.title: Wrap text in panel
textWrap.description: If header text is to long to fit in single line, then text can be wrapped or horizontal bar occurs. Restart needed.

visibility.title: Visibility mode
visibility.description: Set the visibility mode of tree headers. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

centerScroll.title: Center scroll mode
centerScroll.description: After tree click scroll the editor to place the cursor at the center.

animationThreshold.title: Threshold of scroll animation
animationThreshold.description: After tree click the editor scroll with animation of [smooth-scroll](https://github.com/asiloisad/pulsar-smooth-scroll) if distance between screen position and header is below the limit.

traceVisible.title: Trace visible headers
traceVisible.description: Mark icon of visible headers and scroll view of navigation-tree.

categories.title: Categories for headers
categories.description: Mark headers by categories. The categories can be filtered in bottom bar of panel, context menu of panel or by command. The categories are predefined: info, success, warning, error. The meaning of the categories depends on the creativity of the user, use them as you like.

info.title: Show info category headers
info.description: Global state of category. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

success.title: Show success category headers
success.description: Global state of category. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

warning.title: Show warning category headers
warning.description: Global state of category. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

error.title: Show error category headers
error.description: Global state of category. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

standard.title: Show category-less headers
standard.description: Global state of category. You can change this parameter for Atom instance by command or in conext-menu of panel. Restart needed.

commands.title: Section commands
commands.description: The `|` symbol can be used to use multiple names. The regexs are case sensitive and must be valid JavaScript regex statment **without groups**.

inBlock.title: Show sections inside define block
inBlock.description: You can outline section inside define block or not. Refocus needed.

icons.title: Show icons for chapters and programs
icons.description: The icons can be used to change state of chapter of program. Refocus needed.

useHeaders.title: Use Headers in navigation-list
useHeaders.description: Tasklist use headers concept to part a list. You can use them as nodes in navigation-list.
